price: 187 Fais donc tomber le ciel sur nous par pans entiers, si tu dis la vérité ! »
arabic: فَأَسۡقِطۡ عَلَيۡنَا كِسَفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fa-asqiṭ ʿalaynā kisafan mina al-samāi in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
